| `href`     | `href`     |             | `string`             | `undefined` |

## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                        | Description                 |
| --------------------------- | --------------------------- |
| `--pv-button-padding-end`   | Right padding of the button |
| `--pv-button-padding-start` | Left padding of the button  |
